artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Kawachiya Genshichi
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: censor seal: 極 {kiwame} | publisher\'s seal: 河源 {Kawagen}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: 五渡亭國貞画 {Gototei Kunisada ga}
text: Presumably part of a triptych. Related to the play "Soga moyō iwase no kumi obi" 曽我綉妹背組帯, performed at the Nakamura Theater in the first month of 1819.
title: Actor Iwai Matsunosuke I as the Prostitute Kewaizaka no Shōshō
